text.Prompt:
Item specification:
Replacement Remote Control for POLK SURROUNDBAR 6000IHT, RE13051, IHT4000

Item keywords:
Custom built remote made by Redi Remote for Polk remote control number RE13051
Not an original remote control, custom replacement remote
Compatible with following models of POLK units: SURROUNDBAR 6000IHT, RE13051, IHT4000, SURROUNDBAR 4000IHT, SURROUNDBAR 3000IHT, IHT3000, IHT6000
Cover over lower half of remote and slides down to reveal lower half buttons
Redi-Remotes cannot be programmed to control any auxillary devices. They will do every function for the specific unit they are designed to control.
Remote measures 7 1/2" x 2 1/4" x 3/4"
Redi-Remotes are not equipped with laser pointers or LED lights.

Product description:
text.Response A: This is a custom replacement remote made by Redi Remote for the Polk remote control number RE13051. It will replace the lower half of your original remote control and cover over the lower half buttons. It measures 7 1/2" x 2 1/4" x 3/4". This remote is not an original remote control and is not programmed to control any auxillary devices.
text.Response B:
Redi Remote is an authorized Polk Audio dealer and the #1 seller of Polk Audio remote controls in the world. We offer custom-built remotes that are exact replacements for your original remote control. Our remotes are custom-built for each model, so they will work with your specific equipment. They are built to the highest standards to ensure they will last as long or longer than your original remote. Replaces remote control number RE13051, SURROUNDBAR 6000IHT, SURROUNDBAR 4000IHT, SURROUNDBAR 3000IHT, IHT4000, IHT3000, IHT6000.

This is a custom-built remote control that fits Polk Audio models SURROUNDBAR 6000IHT, SURROUNDBAR 4000IHT, SURROUNDBAR 3000IHT, IHT4000, IHT3000, IHT6000. It is a custom-built remote control that is an exact replacement for the original remote control that came with your equipment.

The new remote control is a custom-built remote control that is an exact replacement for the original remote control that came with your Polk Audio equipment.

The remote control is custom-built to work with your equipment and is an exact replacement for the remote control that came with your Polk Audio equipment. It features a sliding lower half that reveals the lower half buttons, and it measures 7 1/2" x 2 1/4" x 3/4".

This remote control is custom-built to work with your Polk Audio equipment and is an exact replacement for the original remote control that came with your equipment. It measures 7 1/2" x 2 1/4" x 3/4" and has a sliding lower half that reveals the lower half buttons.

We are an authorized dealer of Polk Audio remote controls, and our products are custom-built to work with your specific equipment. meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
